channel.title: Vanity: A Hectic Retro-Style blood-filled neon-lights-everywhere box murder simulator
channel.description:
Hello!
I haven't been posting on this forum for a long time, because of some serious IRL stuff, but I am working on [i]Vanity[/i], which is, from the topic title, "A Hectic Retro-Style blood-filled neon-lights-everywhere box murder simulator".
I have a whole page that talks about it on IndieDB, along with a download, a video, a piece from the [i]fucking awesome[/i] soundtrack, and where I will be posting updates!
[url]https://www.indiedb.com/games/vanity[/url]
I wanted your opinion, some feedback, or suggestions on the game to help make it better while I am working on it!
Also, not everything is finished: Bosses 4 and 5 aren't made yet, and the challenges screen isn't made either, so hang tight! :wink:

item.title: Vanity: A Hectic Retro-Style blood-filled neon-lights-everywhere box murder simulator
item.dc:creator: brokenfridgehinge
item.description:
I think they should be ZombieAlienMutantPlantLawyerGhostDemonBugs.
But seriously, squares are fine. They’re rogue pixels!

Read full topic
item.source: Vanity: A Hectic Retro-Style blood-filled neon-lights-everywhere box murder simulator

item.title: Vanity: A Hectic Retro-Style blood-filled neon-lights-everywhere box murder simulator
item.dc:creator: Phobos001
item.description:
Idi:

do they have to be boxes

Uh…What else would they be?

Zombies?

Aliens?

Mutants?

Plants?

Lawyers?

Ghosts?

Demons?

Bugs?

I didn’t know what to do, so yeah. :retard:

Read full topic
